<!--
Title format (Conventional Commit style):

  <type>: short description

Examples:
  feat: add submission filtering
  fix: correct null check in auth middleware
-->

# Description

What is changing and why?  
Keep this brief but clear.

## Type of change

- [ ] feat (new feature)
- [ ] fix (bug fix)
- [ ] refactor (non-functional change)
- [ ] docs (documentation only)
- [ ] test (tests only)
- [ ] chore (maintenance)
- [ ] ci (pipeline/config changes)
- [ ] build (dependency or build changes)

## Notes for reviewers

Anything helpful for understanding the change:

- context
- tradeoffs
- follow-up work
- known limitations

## Checklist

- [ ] Follows Conventional Commits
- [ ] CI passes
- [ ] Tests added/updated if meaningful
- [ ] Docs updated if meaningful
